00056 void NeuronType::ClearNeuronType(){

00058         this->ntables=0;
00059         this->nstatevars=0;

00062 void NeuronType::LoadNeuronType(char * neutype) throw (EDLUTFileException){
00063         FILE *fh;
00064         long Currentline = 0L;
00065         char neufile[MAXIDSIZE+5];
00066         //type = neutypes+ni;
00067         strcpy(this->ident,neutype);
00068         strcpy(neufile,neutype);
00069         strcat(neufile,".cfg");
00070         fh=fopen(neufile,"rt");
00071         if(fh){
00072                 Currentline=1L;
00073                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00074                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->nstatevars)==1){
00075                         unsigned int nv;
00076                         if(this->nstatevars < MAXSTATEVARS){
00077                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00078                                 for(nv=0;nv<this->nstatevars;nv++){
00079                                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->statevartables[nv])!=1){
00080                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,41,3,1,Currentline);
00081                                         }
00082                                 }
00083                                 
00084                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00085           
00086                         for(nv=0;nv<this->nstatevars;nv++){
00087                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%f",&this->initvalues[nv])!=1){
00088                                         throw EDLUTFileException(13,42,3,1,Currentline);
00089                                 }
00090                         }
00091                 } else{
00092                         throw EDLUTFileException(13,4,29,1,Currentline);
00093                         }
00094        
00095                         skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00096                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->firingtable)==1){
00097                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00098                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->firingendtable)==1){
00099                                         skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00100                                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->nsynapticvars)==1){
00101                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00102                                 for(nv=0;nv<this->nsynapticvars;nv++){
00103                                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->synapticvars[nv])!=1){
00104                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,40,3,1,Currentline);
00105                                         }
00106                                 }
00107                                 
00108                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00109                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->ntables)==1){
00110                                         unsigned int nt;
00111                                         int tdeptables[MAXSTATEVARS];
00112                                         int tstatevarpos,ntstatevarpos,ctablen;
00113                                         
00114                                         for(nt=0;nt<this->ntables;nt++){
00115                                                 this->tables[nt].LoadTableDescription(fh, Currentline); 
00116                                         }
00117                  
00118                                         this->ntstatevars=0;
00119                                         for(nt=0;nt<this->nstatevars;nt++){
00120                                                         ctablen=this->statevartables[nt];
00121                                                 for(nv=0;nv<this->tables[ctablen].GetDimensionNumber() && this->tables[ctablen].GetDimensionAt(nv).statevar != 0;nv++);
00122                                                 if(nv<this->tables[ctablen].GetDimensionNumber()){
00123                                                         tdeptables[nt]=1;
00124                                                         this->ntstatevars++;
00125                                                 }else{
00126                                                         tdeptables[nt]=0;
00127                                                 }
00128                                         }
00129          
00130                                                 tstatevarpos=0;
00131                                                 ntstatevarpos=this->ntstatevars; // we place non-t-depentent variables in the end, so that they are evaluated afterwards
00132                                                 for(nt=0;nt<this->nstatevars;nt++){
00133                                                 this->statevarorder[(tdeptables[nt])?tstatevarpos++:ntstatevarpos++]=nt;
00134                                                 }
00135                                 }else{
00136                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,37,3,1,Currentline);
00137                                         }
00138                                 }else{
00139                                         throw EDLUTFileException(13,36,3,1,Currentline);
00140                                 }
00141                                 }else{
00142                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,43,3,1,Currentline);
00143                         }
00144                         }else{
00145                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,35,3,1,Currentline);
00146                         }
00147                 }else{
00148                         throw EDLUTFileException(13,34,3,1,Currentline);
00149                 }
00150         }else{
00151                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,25,13,0,Currentline);
00152         }
00153 }

00157 void NeuronType::LoadTables() throw (EDLUTException){
00158         FILE *fd;
00159         unsigned int i;
00160         NeuronModelTable * tab;
00161         char tablefile[MAXIDSIZE+5];
00162         strcpy(tablefile,this->ident);
00163         strcat(tablefile,".dat");
00164         fd=fopen(tablefile,"rb");
00165         if(fd){
00166                 for(i=0;i<this->ntables;i++){
00167                         tab=&this->tables[i];
00168                         tab->LoadTable(fd);
00169                         if(tab->GetDimensionNumber() != this->tables[i].GetDimensionNumber()){
00170                                 //char msgbuf[160];
00171                                 //sprintf(msgbuf,"The table %i of file %s has a diferent number of dimensions from the one specified in the configuration file",i,type->ident);
00172                                 //show_error(msgbuf);
00173                         }
00174                 }
00175                 fclose(fd);
00176         }else{
00177                 throw EDLUTException(10,24,13,0);
00178         }
00179 }
